attributes.action: Make insurance policies based on sex illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women only policies or preferential term policies are morally wrong and should be banned.  If they were aimed at a single ethnic or religious group it would be classed as discriminatory and illegal.  The two are exactly the same though and even though these people can twist statistics around to suit their purposes in this the same could be done for other groups.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
